translationtableentry.text: La regione ha quattro aree e un gran numero di forti neutrali. Una volta catturato, un forte addestrerà unità casuali. Riuscirai a sconfiggere i tuoi nemici e a ottenere il controllo della zona?
translationtableentry.result: The region has four areas and a large number of neutral outposts. Once captured, an outpost will train random units. Will you be able to defeat your enemies and claim control of the area?

translationtableentry.text: La región cuenta con cuatro áreas y con un gran número de fortines neutrales. Una vez capturado, un fortín entrenará unidades aleatorias. ¿Conseguirás derrotar a tus enemigos y hacerte con el control de la zona?
translationtableentry.result: The region has four areas and a large number of neutral outposts. Once captured, an outpost will train random units. Will you be able to defeat your enemies and claim control of the area?
